row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_ENVIRONMENT@WINDOWS
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_COMMON_OPTIONS
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
Write-Host Deleting network ACL &UC4RB_AWS_ACL_ID#..
$output = java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/itpa-tool.jar" arb -cmd execute $env:EC2_HOME\bin\ec2-delete-network-acl.cmd &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# &UC4RB_AWS_ACL_ID#
$result = $output | select-string -pattern ^RETURN.*true$ -caseSensitive
[string]::join("`n", $output)
if (![bool]($result)) { Write-Host Failed to delete network ACL exit 1 }
Write-Host "`nSuccessfully delete network ACL"
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS
